metadata.description: The number of agents for the cluster.  This value can be from 1 to 100

Sets the Domain name label for the agent pool IP Address.  The concatenation of the domain name label and the regional DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address.
Sets the subnet of agent pool 'agentpool1'.
The size of the Virtual Machine.
The number of agents for the cluster.  This value can be from 1 to 100
Sets the subnet of agent pool 'agentpool2'.
The size of the Virtual Machine.
The number of agents for the cluster.  This value can be from 1 to 100
Sets the subnet of agent pool 'agentpoolw'.
The size of the Virtual Machine.
Sets the static IP of the first master
User name for the Linux Virtual Machines (SSH or Password).
KeyVaultId0 to install certificates from on linux machines.
CertificateURL0 to install from KeyVaultId0 on linux machines.
KeyVaultId1 to install certificates from on linux machines.
CertificateURL0 to install from KeyVaultId1 on linux machines.

Sets the Domain name label for the master IP Address.  The concatenation of the domain name label and the regional DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address.
Sets the subnet of the master node(s).
The size of the Virtual Machine.
A string hash of the master DNS name to uniquely identify the cluster.
SSH public key used for auth to all Linux machines.  Not Required.  If not set, you must provide a password key.
Password for the Windows Swarm Agent Virtual Machines.
User name for the Windows Swarm Agent Virtual Machines (Password Only Supported).
KeyVaultId0 to install certificates from on windows machines.
CertificateStore to install Certificate0 from KeyVaultId0 on windows machines.
CertificateStore to install Certificate1 from KeyVaultId0 on windows machines.
Url to retrieve Certificate0 from KeyVaultId0 to install on windows machines.
Url to retrieve Certificate1 from KeyVaultId0 to install on windows machines.

variables.windowsCustomScriptSuffix: $inputFile = '%SYSTEMDRIVE%\AzureData\CustomData.bin' ; $outputFile = '%SYSTEMDRIVE%\AzureData\CustomDataSetupScript.ps1' ; $inputStream = New-Object System.IO.FileStream $inputFile, ([IO.FileMode]::Open), ([IO.FileAccess]::Read), ([IO.FileShare]::Read) ; $sr = New-Object System.IO.StreamReader(New-Object System.IO.Compression.GZipStream($inputStream, [System.IO.Compression.CompressionMode]::Decompress)) ; $sr.ReadToEnd() | Out-File($outputFile) ; Invoke-Expression('{0} {1}' -f $outputFile, $arguments) ;

osProfile.customData:
[base64(concat('#cloud-config

write_files:
 -  encoding: gzip
    content: !!binary |
        
    path: /opt/azure/containers/configure-swarm-cluster.sh
    permissions: "0744"

',variables('agentRunCmdFile'),variables('agentRunCmd')))]

[base64(concat('#cloud-config

write_files:
 -  encoding: gzip
    content: !!binary |
        
    path: /opt/azure/containers/configure-swarm-cluster.sh
    permissions: "0744"

',variables('agentRunCmdFile'),variables('agentRunCmd')))]

[base64('#cloud-config

write_files:
 -  encoding: gzip
    content: !!binary |
        
    path: /opt/azure/containers/configure-swarm-cluster.sh
    permissions: "0744"

')]
